product.longDescription: Offered in single-variety bunches (units) averaging 50–60 plants each. 3 unit, 5 unit, and 30 unit quantity orders must each consist of one variety; no mixing and matching. Mostly jumbo-size, blocky globe bulbs with thick skins and excellent storage potential. Blush is an easy to grow long-day onion. It has brownish-pink skins, light purple rings, and very vigorous foliage. Adaptation: 38–55° latitude.

Blush Plants (F1) Onion Plants

Product ID:4580.014580

Offered in single-variety bunches (units) averaging 50–60 plants each. 3 unit, 5 unit, and 30 unit quantity orders must each consist of one variety; no mixing and matching. Mostly jumbo-size, blocky globe bulbs with thick skins and excellent storage potential. Blush is an easy to grow long-day onion. It has brownish-pink skins, light purple rings, and very vigorous foliage. Adaptation: 38–55° latitude.
